name: Color Bump (itch)
description:
Move your ball around by holding left mouse button down. You can hit the objects that your ball is, any other color will kill you.

This is still in Developement

THIS IS ONLY THE FIRST 6 LEVELS.

Please leave commenst on how to improve this game.!  Does the ball move quicker enough? or is the gravifty of the falling objects to much or to small?..

I need your input, dont download it and say that crap and uninstall it tell me what needs fixing!!
